tr.name: Trophy «Overall rating»
tr.info_1: The trophy is awarded for entering the TOP 200 rating
tr.info_2: The trophy is awarded for entering the TOP 50 rating
tr.info_3: The trophy is awarded for entering the TOP 10 rating
tr.info_4: The trophy is awarded for 1st place in the overall rating

tr.name: Trophy «1 year»
tr.info_4: The trophy is awarded for celebrating the game's birthday

tr.name: Trophy «[IDNAME]»
tr.info_1: Trophy is awarded for entering the top ten players of the tournament «[IDNAME]»
tr.info_2: The trophy is awarded for the third place in the tournament «[IDNAME]»||People start to recognize you on the streets
tr.info_3: The trophy is given for the second place in the tournament «[IDNAME]»|| You were invited to the «Talents program»
tr.info_4: Trophy is awarded for first place in the tournament «[IDNAME]»||Chuck Norris wants to get your autograph

tr.name: Trophy «[IDNAME]»
tr.info_2: The trophy is awarded for capturing all types of fish|on the lake «[IDNAME]»

tr.name: Trophy «[IDNAME]»
tr.info_2: The trophy is awarded for catching a certain weight||Increases the biting intensity of this species by 3%
tr.info_3: The trophy is awarded for catching a certain weight||Increases the biting intensity of this species by 6%
tr.info_4: The trophy is awarded for catching a certain weight||Increases the biting intensity of this species by 9%

qd.name: First thousand!
qd.info: This achievement is obtained when you catch any fish on the base

qd.name: Trivia fan
qd.info: Achievement shall be granted to the masters of catching small fish

qd.name: Water gold
qd.info: Gold crucians - the real wealth of the Shelter!

qd.name: Precisely in the purpose!
qd.info: The basis of true professionalism - catch fish with conceived weight

qd.name: Pikerino
qd.info: Pike - strong and powerful predators, Queens of water element

qd.name: Blueness..
qd.info: Splashed blue, splashed, spilled on the vest, on shoulder straps...

qd.name: Duremar
qd.info: Liquidation leeches, pimples and warts!

qd.name: Crayfish catcher
qd.info: Crayfish has a menacing look, he moves his mustache!

qd.name: As 100 grams!
qd.info: When philologists drink, they drink not a hundred grams, they drink one hundred grams

qd.name: Christmas
qd.info: Happy New Year and Merry Christmas!

qd.name: Heavy-loader
qd.info: You can't catch trout with dry trousers. Let’s get to work.

qd.name: Depth explorer
qd.info: Some fishers say that the deeper we fish the greater our catch

qd.name: Rarity expert
qd.info: The collection of unusual fish is every fisher’s pride

qd.name: Tsarist fisher
qd.info: There can’t be a feast without the tsar fish

qd.name: Spinning master
qd.info: Only persistent fishers gain the recognition

qd.info: Happy New Year and Merry Christmas!

qd.name: Tsarist fisher II

qd.name: Bleaker
qd.info: Limnetic sprats

qd.name: Chubs
qd.info: Bugs'n'flies menace

qd.info: Catch up and over!

qd.name: Christmas 2019
